title: This is so stupid
body: So last season i started b4 and climbed all the way to silver 3, and on my other account i got to silver 5, Now this season on my main i won 6/10 games and got b2, i carried half, and on my other account i won 7/10 and carried at least 4 and got b2. I dont understand how i can only get b2 off that many wins, the scores and so on

replies.body: You'll climb, if you belong there

You're likely to get placed lower, however you should take note that the lower your group's MMR during placements the lower you'll place.

If the majority of players you were matched with are Bronze when you were Silver, it will match you in Bronze.
If you were Silver and match with Plat and Gold players you'll retain your Silver ranking.

It's a SOFT reset, which means it takes your performance from the last season into account in order to match you with people you are best suited to play with during the placements.
Can't have Bronzies getting matched with last season Challengers now can we?

Also you should take note that the highest placements will ever put you is Plat 1. Yes, you can win 10 out of 10 in your placements if you were the number one Challenger the last season and the highest you can possibly get is PLAT 1.

Learn how the system works before you complain about it not working.
Everybody will get placed lower. I won 7/10 from plat 2 to plat 5
